title: Multimedia-Enhanced Microlearning for Continuing Engineering Education (CEE)

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational engineering theories and practical experience, proficiency in digital device utilization
context.additional_context: Modular learning, real-time feedback, and collaborative environments via mobile devices.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze text-based multimedia content for engineering problem-solving with 80% or higher accuracy.
Learners can create dynamic interactive graphics that simulate the engineering design process using drawings and diagrams
Learners can apply simulation VR in CEE-related practical scenarios to evaluate problem-solving strategies
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
